ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: (?<!Heroic.*)(Ahn'kahet|Azjol-Nerub|Stratholme|Drak'Tharon|Gundrak|Halls of Lightning|Halls of Stone|Nexus|Oculus|Trial of the Champion|Utgarde Keep|Utgarde Pinnacle|Violet Hold|Pit of Saron|Halls of Reflection|Forge of Souls)

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Dungeons (Heroic)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic.*(Ahn'kahet|Azjol-Nerub|Stratholme|Drak'Tharon|Gundrak|Halls of Lightning|Halls of Stone|Nexus|Oculus|Trial of the Champion|Utgarde Keep|Utgarde Pinnacle|Violet Hold|Pit of Saron|Halls of Reflection|Forge of Souls)|Sjonnir The Ironshaper in $|Zuramat the Obliterator in $|Drakkari Elemental in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Military Quarter
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Instructor Razuvious|Gothik the Harvester|The Four Horsemen|Four Horsemen Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Military Quarter
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Instructor Razuvious|Gothik the Harvester|The Four Horsemen|Four Horsemen Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: 25 Man Raids
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic.*(Naxxramas|Eye of Eternity|Obsidian Sanctum)$|\(25|Sartharion in $|Alexstrasza's Gift in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Trial of the Grand Crusader
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic Trial of the Crusader \(10|Tribute Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Trial of the Grand Crusader
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Heroic Trial of the Crusader \(25|Champions' Cache in $|Tribute Chest

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Tier 9 Raids (10/25) ToC/ToGC
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Trial of the Crusader|Champions' Cache in $

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Trophy of the Crusade
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Trophy of the Crusade|Valiant Laradia|Valiant Bressia

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Emblem of Frost
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Emblem of Frost|Mark of Sanctification|Sanctified|Witch's|Lasherweave|Dark Coven|Ymirjar Lord's

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Tier 9
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Trophy of the Crusade|Regalia of the Grand

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Armor Tokens
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Regalia|Forgotten|Lost|Wayward|Fallen|Vanquished|Desecrated|Trophy|Dubin Clay| 1 \[Emblem of Triumph|Mark of Sanctification|Sanctified|Champion Isimode|Witch's|Lasherweave

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Special Currency (Emblems, Tokens, etc.)
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Purchasable with(?!.*(\ds.*\dc|Mark of Honor))|(?<!PvP.*)(Harold Winston|Valerie Langrom|Magister Brasael|Dubin Clay|Lady Palanseer|Arcanist Ivrenne|Paldesse|Purkom|'Grizzly' D\. Adams|Brightlink|Hexil Garrot|Champion Isimode|Arcanist Firael|Arcanist Adurin|Enchanter Erodin|Valiant Laradia|Valiant Bressia|Venture Coin)

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Knights of the Ebon Blade
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Duchess Mynx|Knights of the Ebon|Ebon Blade

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Faction Reputation
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Friendly|Honored|Revered|Exalted|Duchess Mynx|Archmage Alvareaux|Cielstrasza|Tanak|Geen|Veteran Crusader Aliocha Segard|Lillehoff|Horde Expedition|Kalu'ak|Logistics Officer Brighton|Alliance Vanguard|\ds.*\dc

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Rare Elite
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Aotona|Dirkee|Griegen|High Thane Jorfus|Icehorn|King Ping|Old Crystalbark|Putridus the Ancient|Seething Hate|Terror Spinner|Vigdis the War Maiden|Vyragosa|Zul'drak Sentinel|Tukemuth|Syreian the Bonecarver|Scarlet Highlord Daion|Perobas the Bloodthirster|Loque'nahak|King Krush|Hildana Deathstealer|Grocklar|Fumblub Gearwind|Crazed Indu'le Survivor|Skoll

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Arena Points
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Arena Points$|Blazzek the Biter|Argex Irongut|Nargle Lashcord|Grex Brainboiler|Trapjaw Rix|for 0 Points| 0 PVP|Kezzik the Striker|Big Zokk Torquewrench|Xazi Smolderpipe

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Honor Points
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Honor Points$|Doris Volanthius|Lieutenant Tristia|Captain Dirgehammer|Sergeant Thunderhorn|Leeni

ItemFilterRegex.Name: PvP
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: PVP|Goodman|Points|Mark of Honor|Sergeant Thunderhorn|Blazzek the Biter|Kezzik the Striker|Grex Brainboiler|Nargle Lashcord|Big Zokk Torquewrench|Xazi Smolderpipe|Lieutenant Tristia|Doris Volanthius|Arena Rating|Leeni

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Burning Crusade
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Sunwell|Yrma|Theremis|Tydormu|Black Temple|Hyjal|Veynna Dawnstar|Tempest Keep|Serpentshrine Cavern|Zul'Aman|G'eras|Anwehu|Badge of Justice|Asuur|Karazhan|Gruul's Lair|Magtheridon's Lair|Old Hillsbrad Foothills|Blood Furnace|Slave Pens|Arcatraz|Underbog|Shattered Halls|Hellfire Ramparts|Magisters' Terrace|Auchenai Crypts|Shadow Labyrinth|Sethekk Halls|Steamvault|Mana-Tombs|Botanica|Mechanar|Black Morass|Spirit Shard|Forgotten Vanquisher

ItemFilterRegex.Name: Seasonal
ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Coren Direbrew|Headless Horseman|Apothecary Hummel|Ice Chest|Satchel of Chilled Goods

ItemFilterRegex.Pattern: Unknown|Not found on armory|Armory reports no source
